location.sjis: ディックル村 住宅地

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: 追い出されたワケじゃないから 気にしないで
portrait_l.ascii: It's not like we were thrown out, so don't worry about it

portrait_l.name: zakk
portrait_l.sjis: あんまりケンカばっか してるなよな
portrait_l.ascii: Don't fight all the time, okay?

portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: ジェイド相手にエンリョは無用だ 負けんじゃないよ！
portrait_l.ascii: There's no need to hold back against Jade, just don't lose!

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: 村の外には、はぐれが いっぱいいるから 出ちゃいけないんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: There are lots of strays outside the village, so we can't leave.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: 人の武器を預かるって、 何がおもしろいのかしら 釣りのおじさんといい、
portrait_l.ascii: I wonder what's so interesting about looking after people's weapons.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: あの池にはへんなひとばかり 集まるわね ホント、何がおもしろいのかしら
portrait_l.ascii: A lot of strange people have gathered at that pong. Really, what's so great about it?
